text: The Young Lions is a 1958 American World War II drama movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and based on the 1948 novel of the same name by Irwin Shaw. It stars Marlon Brando, Montgomery Clift, Dean Martin, Hope Lange, Barbara Rush, Maximillian Schell, Lee Van Cleef and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1959. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:1958 war movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk
title: The Young Lions
